Message:
Hathor’s exotic dance,
accompanied by Milla’s music,
would be the opening act.
Perfect, one down!

Huh?
Mimi, you want to dance too?
Sure, sure!
We can all dance together!

She quickly took charge,
dishing out instructions and
organizing everything in no time.

We sure got lucky,
having someone with lots of
experience behind and on-stage.
If anything, the real issue was...

“You want me to be
your assistant, Great Cordie?!
I can’t do that!
No way, no how!”

“Aw, shoot!
Now our whole show’s gonna
go up in smoke ’cause of me...
Aaaargh!”

Yeah...it’s been pretty much
like this the whole time...

Welp, no biggie.
Looks like it’s up to
Ringmaster Cordie
to save the day!
